definition: socialization/to socialize/to fit into society/to train sb for society
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to make into/to change into/-ization/to ... -ize/to transform/abbr. for 化學|化学[hua4 xue2]

sentences.english: Virtuality and social media are closely tied.
sentences.chinese: 虛擬世界和社會化媒體關係緊密。

sentences.english: They're the most cooperative and the most social of all vultures.
sentences.chinese: 在禿鷲中，它們的協作性與社會化程度是最好的。

sentences.english: Corporations have had the precursor of social networks for ages.
sentences.chinese: 很長時間以來，企業都是社會化網絡應用的先驅。

sentences.english: Study on Agricultural Socialized Service System in the Process of Building New Socialist Countrysides;
sentences.chinese: 社會化服務體系建設是發展非公有制林業的基本保障。

sentences.english: And yet, for me, social media remains the other kind of social.
sentences.chinese: 但是對於我來說，社會化媒體是隻另外一種社會。

sentences.english: If you stick to Google, you'll also miss out on social searching.
sentences.chinese: 假如你死盯Google，你將錯失社會化搜索。

sentences.english: Socialization is one reason I wanted my son to attend public initially.
sentences.chinese: 社會化是我最初想讓我兒子去公立學校的一個原因。

sentences.english: The resocialization of criminals is the main content of criminal reformation.
sentences.chinese: 對罪犯的再社會化是改造罪犯工作的核心內容。

sentences.english: Can enterprises benefit from social bookmarking and wikis?
sentences.chinese: 公司能從社會化書籤與維基中獲益嗎？

sentences.english: Global education is the socialization process into globalization.
sentences.chinese: 全球教育是走向全球化的社會化過程。

sentences.english: Social networking platforms are extremely popular now.
sentences.chinese: 社會化網絡平臺現在非常流行。

sentences.english: Paradigmatic rules are socialized norms that force firms to take into isomorphism seriously.
sentences.chinese: 典範規則即規範產業同形的社會化壓力。

sentences.english: Humans have been socialized over ages to think of pain in terms of justice.
sentences.chinese: 人類在漫長的社會化中逐漸從正義的角度來看待痛苦。
你怎樣應對社會化的問題？

sentences.english: On socialization degree, "Shushu" is more thorough as "Shu".
sentences.chinese: “叔叔”在社會化程度上相對於“叔”更徹底。

sentences.english: Market economy is full fledged commodity economy under socialized mass production.
sentences.chinese: 市場經濟是社會化大生產條件下充分發育的商品經濟。

definition: (abbr. for 嘗試錯誤|尝试错误) trial and error/failure
all-round education (contrasted with 應試教育|应试教育[ying4 shi4 jiao4 yu4], exam-oriented education)
